competition_summary.context: Competition While a large number of enterprises and service providers, such as hyperscale cloud service providers, own their own data centers, we believe the industry is shifting away from single-tenant solutions to outsourcing some or all of their IT housing and interconnection requirements to third party facilities, such as those operated by us. This shift is being accelerated by the increasing adoption of hybrid multicloud architectures. Historically, the outsourcing market was served by larg
